February 1965

October 1965

The linguistics department decided to delay the formal institution of the major program because they felt that to give an adequate major they needed another person.

Between 1965 and 1971, four faculty depart from the Graduate School for Arts and Sciences’ linguistics department.

February 1971

February 1972

3 more people left???!!!

1983

major is discontinued at Columbia.

October 1984

FPC eliminate a tenure track positions
